definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
to invite/to recruit/to levy (taxes)/to draft (troops)/phenomenon/symptom/characteristic sign (used as proof)/evidence
journey/trip/expedition/to go on long campaign/to attack
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: The nullity of a graph is the multiplicity of the eigenvalue zero in its spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 图的零度是指在图的谱中特征值0的重数。

sentences.english: Finally, we simply talk about the application and development of inverse eigenvalue problem.
sentences.chinese: 最后，浅谈了矩阵逆特征值问题的应用。

sentences.english: The eigenvalue problem with the effective-mass approximation is solved by means of the finite-element method.
sentences.chinese: 用有限元法解出有效质量近似的特征值问题。

sentences.english: We can get the ellipticity and linearity from the eigenvalues of the covariance matrix.
sentences.chinese: 由矩阵的特征值，求取椭圆率和线性因子。

sentences.english: The quality of the clustering result can be evaluated applying the intra-cluster singularity value.
sentences.chinese: 聚类结果通过簇内奇异特征值进行评价。

sentences.english: In this paper, we present an inverse eigenvalue problem for real bi-antisymmetric matrices.
sentences.chinese: 讨论实完全反对称矩阵的一个特征值反问题。

sentences.english: A class of eigen value problems is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究一类特征值问题及其应用。

sentences.english: The calculation of eigenvalue problem is one of the basic topics of scientific computing.
sentences.chinese: 特征值问题的计算方法是科学计算基本论题之一。

sentences.english: For example, no function returns the eigenvalues of a matrix.
sentences.chinese: 例如，它没有返回矩阵的特征值的函数。

sentences.english: Including the calculation of matrix eigenvalue problem, error and so on.
sentences.chinese: 其中包括计算矩阵的特征值问题，误差问题等。

sentences.english: The equilibrium point of the network and the eigenvalue is only need to get the result.
sentences.chinese: 所有结果只需计算网络的平衡点与矩阵的特征值。

sentences.english: An iteration procedure can be used to determine the eigenvalue.
sentences.chinese: 迭代方法可用来确定特征值。

sentences.english: Can see that extended interpolation method is superior than standard power.
sentences.chinese: 可以看出扩展特征值法比标准乘幂法优越。

sentences.english: In this paper a method is presented for solving Non-linear Eigenvalue problems.
sentences.chinese: 对非线性特征值的求介本文提出了一种方法。

sentences.english: The frequency distribution of characteristic value of the male cones and pollen is abnomal.
sentences.chinese: 杉木雄球花及花粉特征值频率分布为偏态分布。

sentences.english: An inverse eigenvalue problem for damped gyroscopic systems is considered.
sentences.chinese: 本文考虑一类阻尼陀螺系统特征值反问题。

definition: eigenvalue (math.)/also written 特徵值|特征值

pinyin: zui4 da4 si4 ran2 gu1 ji4

definition: to fit (data to a model)/a (close) fit
